pages.text: $(li)Platypuses are small passive creatures mostly covered in brown fur, having gray on their bill and webbed feet.$(br)$(li)You don't want to attack them or you will be poisonned you for 5 seconds.$(br)$(li)Platypus can be bred with Lobster Tails or Cooked Lobster Tails.

$(li)You can attract Platypus with Redstone.$(br)$(li)Give them Redstone Powder or Redstone Blocks to make them find something useful for you in near clay blocks, like Maggots, Clay Balls, or even a Fedora.
